title: Essentials of Guitar
description: Everyone was once a beginner. Get comfortable, understand the language , just enough

title: BasicsGuitar
description: You are introduced to chords. You'll learn 3 simple songs Melody and Chords
description-expectation: By the end of this, you will be able to play pretty much any song.

title: Intermediate
description: You will expand from C Major to GMajor and DMajor. And look at 4 beautiful pieces
